div.h2: Welcome to the Home of the Rangers!

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled K-5 At Home Learning

div.div: Please visit the At-Home Learning section of our website to access the weekly calendars and supporting resources for students in grades K-5.
div.a: Read More About K-5 At Home Learning

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled April 27 - May 1 STUDENT Meal Distribution

div.div: ​Please click this link for the student Meal Distribution menu for the week of April 20-24.
div.a: Read More About April 27 - May 1 STUDENT Meal Distribution

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled #SpencerportTogether April 27-May 1 menu

div.div: Please click this link for the #SpencerportTogether menu for the week of April 27 to May 1.

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled E-edition of Cornerstone, Apr. 2020

div.div: The spring electronic edition of Cornerstone has been posted, with news and updates, including:
div.a: Read More About E-edition of Cornerstone, Apr. 2020

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Have you filled out the 2020 Census?

a.title: Have you filled out the 2020 Census?

div.a: Have you filled out the 2020 Census?
div.div: The United States Census provides critical data that lawmakers, business owners, schools, and many others use to provide daily services, products, and support for you and your community.
div.a: Read More About Have you filled out the 2020 Census?

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Reminder: all playgrounds, fields, and courts are closed

a.title: Reminder: all playgrounds, fields, and courts are closed

div.a: Reminder: all playgrounds, fields, and courts are closed
div.div: It is imperative that we practice social distancing in its entirety. All of our fields, playgrounds, courts and facilities are CLOSED at this time. This includes our main campus, Munn and Taylor. #SpencerportTogether #FlattenTheCurve
div.a: Read More About Reminder: all playgrounds, fields, and courts are closed

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled SpencerportCSD named 2020 Top Workplace

div.div: Spencerport Central School has been awarded a Top Workplaces 2020 honor by The Democrat and Chronicle. The honor, which is the second year in a row for Spencerport, is based solely on employee feedback
div.a: Read More About SpencerportCSD named 2020 Top Workplace

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled 2020-21 Calendar adopted

div.div: The 2020-21 calendar may be found at this link. This summary provides dates for opening day, holidays, and recesses.
